wf_workflow_version.description: Hotel Image and/or content review workflow
wf_workflow_version.name: Content Review Request
wf_workflow_version.on_cancel: // This script executes if the workflow is cancelled.// The global variable context_sys_id contains the sys_id of the cancelled workflow context.

wf_workflow.description: Hotel Image and/or content review workflow
wf_workflow.name: Content Review Request

sys_variable_value.value: Content Review Request Number: ${number} has been submitted
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Content Review Request Number: ${number} has been submitted
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

wf_activity.name: Email Done in a Day Confirmation to requestor

sys_variable_value.value: Your request Number: ${number} - ${short_description} has been completed by the Content Operations team !!
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your request Number: ${number} - ${short_description} has been completed by the Content Operations team !!
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Email Done in a Day Confirmation to requestor

wf_activity.name: Request Complete (but not in a day)

sys_variable_value.value: Your Content request Number ${number} has completed
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.
Your Content request Number ${number} has completed
// Set the variable 'answer' to a comma-separated list of user or group sys_ids that you want the email sent to.

activity.display_value: Request Complete (but not in a day)

wf_condition.name: Complete
wf_condition.short_description: All predecessor activities have transitioned to this activity

wf_condition.name: Incomplete
wf_condition.short_description: At least one predecessor activities did not transition to this activity

wf_activity.name: Who needs to review this content

activity.display_value: Who needs to review this content
Who needs to review this content
Who needs to review this content
